title: whyrqa
author: whyrqa
created_time: July 10, 2022, 07:45:04 AMLast edit: July 10, 2022, 08:11:39 AM by whyrqa
content: AFRICUNIA BANK a digital banking app that fulfils your financial transactional needs. From transferring your money or receiving payments, we keep track of all your money. With 2.5 million users online, we are providing our services in 180+ countries. The customer support is 24/7, and we are dealing with currencies worldwide. Our intuitive global money transfer app is easy to use, fastest, and 100% secure.Dear customers,Azbit will host an Initial Exchange Offering (IEO) for AFCASH Coin (AFCASH)!START TIME: 1 PM (UTC) July 11, 2022.📍AFCASH is the native currency of AFRICUNIA Blockchain Digital Bank, an advanced financial institution that offers both traditional and innovative banking services.AFRICUNIA BANK has created a whole galaxy of proprietary economic and social impact projects including e-commerce, Dex, video streaming platform, agriculture, real estate, renewable energy, resorts, social media, humanitarian organization and more. In addition, the project plans to launch Metaverse and NFT marketplace.IEO DETAILS▫️Sale Token Amount: 40,000,000 AFCASH▫️Hard Cap: $ 10,000,000▫️Soft Cap: $ 500,000▫️Price: $ 0.25▫️Min Investment: $ 10▫️Available currencies for purchase: BTC, ETH, LTC, USDT, BNBMORE ABOUT AFCASH▪️Website: https://africuniabank.com/▪️Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/africuniabank/▪️Facebook : https://web.facebook.com/africuniabank▪️Twitter : https://twitter.com/africuniabank▪️Telegram : https://t.me/africuniabank▪️YouTube: www.youtube.com/channel/UCoNbGd0RgcKZfvtdML7H8-A▪️Medium: https://medium.com/@africuniabanking▪️Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/AFRICUNIA_BANK▪️LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/africunia-bank🚀 Congratulations and welcome to azbit.com!If you used this information, then I congratulate you 💪, because you are already the proud owner of AFCASH 🚀🚀 Now you can relax and watch your investment grow.🚀🚀🚀🚀🚀

comments.author: Aptekary
comments.body: As the name suggests, the project aims to meet the needs of the African region. In which countries will your project work?  Is it possible to pay using your application in Europe?

comments.author: whyrqa
comments.body: Quote from: Aptekary on July 11, 2022, 09:42:23 AMAs the name suggests, the project aims to meet the needs of the African region. In which countries will your project work?  Is it possible to pay using your application in Europe?The project website says that Africunia makes it possible to send and receive money to your loved ones in a matter of minutes at favorable rates and with a low commission.  At the same time, more than 180 countries and 30 currencies are supported.

comments.author: Arkann
comments.body: Any new project, of course the risk, but in relation to AFCASH, I think you can try to try happiness. Although you need to remove as much time as possible for study and analysis.  Startups in the banking sector have prospects.

comments.author: yawars20
comments.body: Quote from: Arkann on July 13, 2022, 04:17:48 AMAny new project, of course the risk, but in relation to AFCASH, I think you can try to try happiness. Although you need to remove as much time as possible for study and analysis.  Startups in the banking sector have prospects. Agreed with you and their is always some degree of uncertainty and doubt but with good background and proper roadmap, a project can convince its users to stay for long run and this could create more opportunity for so many users. In Africunia project they already set a good example in financial sector by spending large sum of 5 years and now with their AFCASH token they are getting much support form community. That's how you get a good mark.

comments.author: Gulu_khan999
comments.body: So they are now joining crypto world through AFCASH. Quite interesting as previously I thought they are not going to join decentralized payment system but they did right thing and join multi billion crypto industry.
